enWisdom: Justice reforms the people
Justice is the system of leadership
Justice is the mainstay of the populace
Justice is the mainstay of the creation)
Leadership (im?mah) is a social order
Obedience is a mark of respect to the Imamate
The masses are not reformed except by justice
The just [ruler] is a custodian who awaits one of the two rewards (or the better of the two rewards)

Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ جُنَّةُ الرَّعِيَّةِ وَالْعَدْلُ جُنَّةُ الدُّوَلِ
enWisdom: Obedience is the shield of the people and justice is the shield of governments
Justice is the mainstay of the populace and the splendour of the rulers

Wisdom: إِذَا بَنَى الْمَلِكُ عَلَى قَوَاعِدِ الْعَدْلِ وَدَعَمَ بِدَعَائِمِ الْعَقْلِ نَصَرَ اللَّهُ مُوَالِيَهُ وَخَذَلَ مُعَادِيَهُ
enWisdom: When a king builds his kingdom on the foundations of justice and sustains it on the pillars of reason, Allah helps his friends and forsakes his enemies
Through justice, the populace is reformed
Be just and your power will last
The stability of nations is through the establishment of the practice of justice
The virtues of an intelligent ruler are spread far and wide
The uprightness [and betterment] of the populace is [achieved through] justice

Wisdom: عَدْلُ السُّلْطَانِ حَيَاةُ الرَّعِيَّةِ وَصَلَاحُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
enWisdom: The justice of a king is the life of the populace and the prosperity of the creatures

Wisdom: فِي الْعَدْلِ الِاقْتِدَاءُ بِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ وَثَبَاتُ الدُّوَلِ
enWisdom: Following the way of Allah and the stability of nations lies in justice
Everyone who surrenders [to Allah] is protected

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ مَرْكَبُكَ الْعَدْلَ فَمَنْ رَكِبَهُ مَلَكَ
enWisdom: Let your riding mount be justice, for one who rides on it gains mastery

Wisdom: لَنْ تَنْقَطِعَ سِلْسِلَةُ الْهَذَيَانِ حَتَّى يُدْرَكَ الثَّأْرُ مِنَ الزَّمَانِ
enWisdom: The chain of delusion will never be severed until the rising of the [Imam of the] avenger of the age

Wisdom: لَنْ تُحَصَّنَ الدُّوَلُ بِمِثْلِ اسْتِعْمَالِ الْعَدْلِ فِيهَا
enWisdom: Nothing ever preserves nations like the exercising of justice in them
One who is just gains [and strengthens his] power [and authority]
The ruling of one who is just gets acted upon
One whose justice increases, his days are praised

Wisdom: مَنْ عَدَلَ فِي الْبِلَادِ نَشَرَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ الرَّحْمَةَ
enWisdom: Allah unfolds His mercy upon one who acts justly in the lands

Wisdom: مَنْ عَدَلَ فِي سُلْطَانِهِ اسْتَغْنَى عَنْ أَعْوَانِهِ
enWisdom: One who is just in his kingship becomes needless of his aides

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِالْعَدْلِ حَصَّنَ اللَّهُ مُلْكَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever acts justly, Allah fortifies his kingdom

Wisdom: مَنْ عَدَلَ فِي سُلْطَانِهِ وَبَذَلَ إِحْسَانَهُ أَعْلَى اللَّهُ شَأْنَهُ وَأَعَزَّ أَعْوَانَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is just in his rule and shows kindness [to the people], Allah will elevate his stature and will strengthen [and grant victory to] his helpers

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ إِلَى رَعِيَّتِهِ نَشَرَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ جَنَاحَ رَحْمَتِهِ وَأَدْخَلَهُ فِي مَغْفِرَتِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever does good to the people, Allah covers him with His mercy and places him in His pardon
Nothing brings prosperity to the lands like justice
Nothing protects empires like justice
